text: Annex The is a museum of the history and culture of Kyoto. The annex served as Heian Museum of Ancient History until 1986. It was designed by Tatsuno Kingo and Uheiji Nagano as the former Bank of Japan Kyoto Branch and designated as Important Cultural Property of Japan in 1969. == References == == External links == * Category:Museums in Kyoto Category:Art museums and galleries in Japan Category:City museums in Japan Category:Museums of Japanese art Category:Buildings of the Meiji period Category:Museums established in 1988 Category:1988 establishments in Japan Category:Japanese museum stubs
title: Museum of Kyoto
